pr_title: [NETBEANS-5075] Remove consecutive empty lines when formatting PHP code

timeline.author: junichi11
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -430,3 +430,8 @@ FmtWrapping.groupUseListLabel.text=G&roup Use List: FmtWrapping.groupUseBracesCheckBox.text_1=Group &Use Braces FmtBraces.groupUseLabel.text=G&roup Use: FmtAlignment.noteLabel.text=Note: These options depend on Wrapping settings +FmtBlankLines.jTextField1.text=jTextField1

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-5075] Remove consecutive empty lines when formatting PHP code

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-5075

Removes multiple empty lines from PHP code.
Adds setting under Formatting/PHP/Blank Lines.

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick: The given text field can be set to be "NOI18N" in its properties (this line would not be here than).
timeline.author: tmysik
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -430,3 +430,7 @@ FmtWrapping.groupUseListLabel.text=G&roup Use List: FmtWrapping.groupUseBracesCheckBox.text_1=Group &Use Braces FmtBraces.groupUseLabel.text=G&roup Use: FmtAlignment.noteLabel.text=Note: These options depend on Wrapping settings +FmtBlankLines.maxPreservedField.text=

timeline.bodyText:
Please, add "blank" everywhere here as it is not apparent what exactly it does. The constant as well as the Symfony rule contains it. Thanks.
CC @junichi11
timeline.author: tmysik
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -430,3 +430,7 @@ FmtWrapping.groupUseListLabel.text=G&roup Use List: FmtWrapping.groupUseBracesCheckBox.text_1=Group &Use Braces FmtBraces.groupUseLabel.text=G&roup Use: FmtAlignment.noteLabel.text=Note: These options depend on Wrapping settings +FmtBlankLines.maxPreservedField.text= +FmtBlankLines.maxPreservedLabel.text=Max Preserved Lines:

replies.bodyText: Changed name to maxPreservedBlankFiled and maxPreservedBlankLabel.
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText: Well, I was talking about the text of the label, not the label name. But thanks for changing it too and sorry for not being clear. Please, improve the label so it is obvious what lines are going to be preserved. Thanks!
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: @tmysik Maybe, I suppose @KacerCZ did not add it because Category is Blank Lines.
replies.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText:
Changing text to "Max Preserved Blank Lines:" widens panel.
I hope meaning of this setting will be clear from category as @junichi11 says.
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText: I see now... OK then. Thanks!
replies.author: tmysik
